Deprecated API

  • Deprecated Interfaces
  • Deprecated Annotation Types
  • Deprecated Fields
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Interfaces 
    Interface and Description
    com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.maps.MapboxMap.OnMyLocationChangeListener
    As of release 4.1.0, replaced by LocationListener
  • Deprecated Annotation Types 
    Annotation Type and Description
    com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.constants.Style.StyleUrl
    use dedicated versioned methods in Style instead.
  • Deprecated Fields 
    Field and Description
    com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.constants.Style.DARK
    use Style.getDarkStyleUrl(int) (int)} instead.
    com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.constants.Style.EMERALD
    this style has been deprecated and will be removed in future versions.
    com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.constants.MapboxConstants.KEY_META_DATA_MANIFEST
    As of release 4.1.0, replaced by MapboxAccountManager.start(Context, String)
    com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.constants.Style.LIGHT
    use Style.getLightStyleUrl(int) instead.
    com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.constants.Style.MAPBOX_STREETS
    use Style.getMapboxStreetsUrl(int) instead.
    com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.constants.Style.SATELLITE
    use Style.getSatelliteStyleUrl(int) instead.
    com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.constants.Style.SATELLITE_STREETS
    use Style.getSatelliteStreetsStyleUrl(int) (int)} instead.

    Method and Description

    com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.maps.MapView.getAccessToken()

    As of release 4.1.0, replaced by MapboxAccountManager.getAccessToken()

    use @link #isAllDismissTrackingOnGestureinstead
    com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.maps.MapboxMap.setAccessToken(String)
    As of release 4.1.0, replaced by MapboxAccountManager.start(Context, String)
    com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.maps.MapView.setAccessToken(String)
    As of release 4.1.0, replaced by MapboxAccountManager.start(Context, String)
    com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.offline.OfflineManager.setAccessToken(String)
    As of release 4.1.0, replaced by MapboxAccountManager.start(Context, String) ()}
    com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.maps.TrackingSettings.setDismissTrackingOnGesture(boolean)
    use @link #setDismissAllTrackingOnGesture instead
    com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.maps.MapboxMap.setOnMyLocationChangeListener(MapboxMap.OnMyLocationChangeListener)
    As of release 4.1.0, replaced by LocationServices.addLocationListener(LocationListener))}
    com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.maps.MapboxMap.setStyle(String)
    use MapboxMap.setStyleUrl(String) instead with versioned url methods from Style
